rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Large welcoming space with natural light from the west.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with integrated kitchen, designed for joint family gatherings.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for seamless flow and enhanced social interaction.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private bedroom with west-facing window, ensuring positive Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for joint family members.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Further bedroom, ensuring ample privacy and comfort.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Smaller bedroom for additional family member or guest.

rooms.name: Study/Office Room
rooms.description: Multipurpose space for work or study, positioned to avoid direct west exposure to minimize distractions.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Convenient guest room with a small attached bathroom.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Ground Floor)
rooms.description: Essential ground floor facilities, ensuring easy access for guests and family members.

openings.features: Large glass doors and security system.

openings.location: Multiple, particularly on west and north facades
openings.features: Floor-to-ceiling windows for maximum natural light while respecting Vastu guidelines.

other_spaces.name: Swimming Pool
other_spaces.description: Modern swimming pool integrated within the garden area, positioned away from main living spaces to reduce noise and ensure privacy.

other_spaces.name: Garden Area
other_spaces.description: Expansive garden with landscaped pathways, seating areas, and native plants designed for relaxation and joint family activities.

vastu_considerations: The main entrance is placed on the south side to ensure positive energy flow.
Living room and kitchen are integrated to promote family interaction.
Bedrooms are oriented in a way that avoids direct west exposure.
building_norms: Compliance with local building regulations for G+2 structures on irregular plots.
Incorporation of sustainable design practices such as natural ventilation and energy-efficient windows.
